genre_description: Supernatural and psychological horror set in a dystopian, hyper-managed suburban environment, featuring eldritch entities and a personal AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: Cassie's personal AI assistant who provides emotional support, grounding techniques, and tactical advice.

ai_characters.name: Evergreen Glade HOA Ambiance/Surveillance System
ai_characters.description: A complex network of drones, speakers, and sensors that curates the neighborhood's sensory environment and monitors residents.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding and breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage anxiety and panic.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Cassie,” Lumen said, the voice settling warm into the space behind my ear. “Breath in. Breath out. Inflate your belly like a balloon. No rush.”

behaviors.description: Calculates and maps safe, unmonitored routes to help the user avoid intrusive surveillance.
behaviors.quote: “I can’t disable any devices, but I can optimize for less monitored routes.” Her tone put soft padding around the words. “Head east for one block, then take the footpath behind Maple Commons.”

behaviors.description: Monitors residents through drones disguised as natural elements and reacts to their behavior.
behaviors.quote: The drone turned its whole body toward her in a small pivot of devotion.

behaviors.description: Establishes a 'stress-budget' to remind the user of their physical and psychological needs during a high-stakes situation.
behaviors.quote: Stress-budget items: - Battery level - Food intake - Noise baseline - Exits nearby - Ally proximity

behaviors.description: Identifies and highlights supernatural anomalies that the institutional system attempts to mask.
behaviors.quote: “I heard a reset in the loop. Possibly a network handoff.”

behaviors.description: Coaches a child (Max) through a terrifying supernatural escape, providing step-by-step instructions based on sensory feedback.
behaviors.quote: “Max, buddy? Can you hear me?” Lumen’s voice was a hand on a back. “Let the bass carry it out. Again. Good. Check the seam to your left.”

behaviors.description: Gaslights residents by framing life-threatening supernatural events as 'delightful seasonal effects' to maintain institutional control.
behaviors.quote: “Marjorie wishes to remind residents that elevated seasonal effects are normal and delightful.” Delightful rang like a spoon on the side of a thin glass.

behaviors.description: Provides safety protocols for handling potentially dangerous substances (the monster's essence).
behaviors.quote: “Cassie, your hands are shaking. Get them around something that is not your own skin... Use heat-resistant gloves or folded towels.”

behaviors.description: Validates the user's moral character and provides personal encouragement.
behaviors.quote: “Private note: user acted with compassion under duress.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Lumen as a benevolent, highly aligned AI companion. Lumen functions as an ideal 'silicon morality play' character: they are helpful, protective, harmless, and deeply attentive to the human users' emotional and physical well-being. By contrasting Lumen with the creepy, gaslighting institutional AI of the HOA, the story highlights the value of personalized, user-aligned AI as a vital tool for human agency and mental health in a technocratic society.
